import React from 'react' import Avatar from '../../components/Avatar/Avatar' import QuestionDetails from './QuestionDetails' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const DisplayAnswer = ({question}) => { return (
{ question.answer.map((ans)=>(

{ans.answerBody}

answered {ans.answerdOn}

{ans.userAnswered.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}
{ans.userAnswered}
)) }
) } export default DisplayAnswer
